playersOnly.name: Players Only
playersOnly.hint: Only trigger tables for player-owned actors

autoRollPlayers.name: Auto-Roll for Players
autoRollPlayers.hint: Automatically roll tables for player rolls instead of showing a button

autoRollNPCs.name: Auto-Roll for NPCs
autoRollNPCs.hint: Automatically roll tables for NPC rolls instead of showing a button

checkSaves.name: Check Saving Throws
checkSaves.hint: Also trigger on natural 1s and 20s for saving throws

checkAbility.name: Check Ability Checks
checkAbility.hint: Also trigger on natural 1s and 20s for ability checks

checkManualRolls.name: Check Manual Rolls
checkManualRolls.hint: Also trigger on min/max values for manual dice rolls (no character)

manualCrit.name: Manual Roll Critical Table UUID
manualCrit.hint: UUID of the RollTable for manual roll maximum values

manualFumble.name: Manual Roll Fumble Table UUID
manualFumble.hint: UUID of the RollTable for manual roll minimum values
